  Le maître Chat ou le Chat Botté
  THE MASTER CAT , OR PUSS IN BOOTS
  0-0 1-1 2-2 3-4 4p5 5p5 6p6 6p7
  (fr-eng)
  - the comma is dropped unaligned, le chat-puss, botté-in boots
